author: Constantino (Constante) Ribalaigua Vert
description: Maraschino cherry liqueur flavours this finely balanced golden rum based Daiquiri.
name: Daiquiri No.4 (Florida style)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
15 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with finely crushed ice and strain into chilled glass
